subject: Order #SSN1680
description_text:
My order never arrived. It has been a month since i ordered this and it
never came to me. My order # is SSN1680.

Please if you can assist me with this that would be appreciated.

Thank you,

Terrence Pascual

conversations.body_text: Hi Terrence Pascual,     Sorry for the delay, it will be delivered in the next couple of days. Here's your tracking link. https://www.track718.us/zh-CN/detail?nums=JSEXL1937162634YQ

Thank you. And if it does not deliver by next week will I be able to
request for a replacement?
